about_the_game:
Eleventh Hour is a grid-based dungeon crawler, with real-time movement and aiming. The game focuses on resource management, exploration, and combat. Set in a setting inspired by series like Stalker or the SCP Foundation and many real-life conspiracy theories, you get to explore and uncover what happened to Site No. 4 - a facility belonging to a secretive organization trying to hide the existence of paranormal phenomena from a world mired in the Cold War.

Key Features


  • Grid-based real-time movement and combat - Movement inspired by other dungeon crawlers like Legend of Grimrock and Vaporum, with added real-time aiming and high interactivity with the environment.
  • Exploration with survival elements - Manage limited resources while trying to survive dangerous anomalies and monsters.
  • Linear story with multiple endings - A story about dark secrets kept hidden from the public and futile efforts to contain them.
  • Atmospheric world - Explore a lonely world full of phenomena beyond human comprehension and control.
  • Full immersion - Immerse yourself in this dark world with a high degree of interactivity.

name: Eleventh Hour
short_description: Eleventh Hour is a grid-based dungeon crawler with FPS elements in a setting inspired by series like Stalker and SCP Foundation, explore, loot and survive as you try to uncover the secrets of Site No. 4 and it's paranormal residents.
